A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm sure all the Star Wars nerds love it\, but it looked like every other Star Wars movie out there to me. As far as quality; it looks good visually\, acting is well done\, directing felt a little shaky at times\, the actors were trying but looked a bit uncertain as to how they should feel. Considering I've seen them act before without an issue\, I have to assume it's the director at major fault. Story was well put together\, not everything has a happy ending and I'm glad to see they used that technique in this film.\n\nOverall\, not too bad at all for a series I have little interest in. I vaguely remember seeing some of the others (I fell asleep through one of them)\, but I may need to watch this new trilogy as this piqued my interest a little.
